import React, { useState } from 'react' import bucketIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/bucket.svg' import Zeccnino from '../../../assets/pictures/coins/golden/coin_front.svg' import goldenKeyIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/keys/golden.svg' import lightningIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/lightning.svg' import robotIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/robot.svg' import saltIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/salt.svg' import shovelIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/shovel.svg' import skinIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/skin.svg' import starIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/star.svg' import tapIcon from '../../../assets/pictures/tap.svg' import Navigation from '../../ui/Navigation/Navigation' import styles from './Boosts.css' const Boosts = () => { const [activeMenuItem, setActiveMenuItem] = useState('SoldoZecchino') const [popupInfo, setPopupInfo] = useState({ title: '', iconSrc: '', }) const dayBoosts = [ { name: 'energy', icon: lightningIcon, time: '00:00' }, { name: 'turbo', icon: goldenKeyIcon, time: '00:00' }, ] const boosts = [ { name: 'energy', icon: lightningIcon, price: '10000' }, { name: 'tap', icon: tapIcon, price: '10000' }, { name: 'auto', icon: robotIcon, price: '10000' }, { name: 'skin', icon: skinIcon, price: '10000' }, ] const coinBoosts = [ { name: 'shovel', icon: shovelIcon, price: '1 zecchino' }, { name: 'bucket', icon: bucketIcon, price: '1 zecchino' }, { name: 'salt', icon: saltIcon, price: '1 zecchino' }, ] const handleMenuItemClick = name => { setActiveMenuItem(name) } const handleBoostClick = (title, iconSrc) => { setPopupInfo({ title, iconSrc }) } const handlePopupClose = () => { setPopupInfo({ title: '', iconSrc: '' }) } return (
{/* modal */} {popupInfo.title && (

)}
